005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.StringItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * An atomic Metapath item containing a text data value.
018 */
019public interface IStringItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
020  /**
021   * Get the type information for this item.
022   *
023   * @return the type information
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IStringItem> type() {
027    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.STRING.getItemType();
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  default IAtomicOrUnionType<? extends IStringItem> getType() {
032    return type();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Construct a new item using the provided string {@code value}.
037   *
038   * @param value
039   *          a string value that must conform to Metaschema string validation
040   *          rules
041   * @return the new item
042   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
043   *           if the value fails string validation
044   */
045  @NonNull
046  static IStringItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
047    try {
048      return new StringItemImpl(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.STRING.parse(value));
049    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
050      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
051          null,
052          String.format("Invalid string value '%s'. %s",
053              value,
054              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
055          ex);
056    }
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
061   *
062   * @param item
063   *          the item to cast
064   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
065   *         cast to this type
066   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
067   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
068   */
069  @NonNull
070  static IStringItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
071    try {
072      return item instanceof IStringItem
073          ? (IStringItem) item
074          : valueOf(item.asString());
075    } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
076      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
077      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
078    }
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  default IStringItem asStringItem() {
083    return this;
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  default IStringItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
088    return cast(item);
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Compares this value with the argument. Ordering is in lexical dictionary
093   * order.
094   *
095   * @param other
096   *          the item to compare with this value
097   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
098   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
099   */
100  default int compareTo(@NonNull IStringItem other) {
101    return asString().compareTo(other.asString());
102  }
103
104  @Override
105  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem other) {
106    return compareTo(other.asStringItem());
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * An implementation of <a href=
111   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-normalize-space">fn::normalize-space</a>.
112   *
113   * @return the normalized string value for this string
114   */
115  @NonNull
116  IStringItem normalizeSpace();
117
118  /**
119   * Get the length of the string.
120   *
121   * @return the length
122   */
123  default int length() {
124    return asString().length();
125  }
126}
